recurring.title: Recurrence

confirmDialog.title: Attribute this reason to similar trips?
confirmDialog.content: By answering yes, this trip will be defined as recurring and will be used as a reference to automate the qualification of your similar trips.

recurring.tooltip: If this trip is recurring, similar trips will automatically be referenced with the same reason.

content.done: The "%{filename}" file was created in the "Drive%{pathAppDir}" folder of your Cozy.
content.progress: The export of your trips is in progress, please wait...

empty.title: Add your trips
empty.text: This application is in experimental phase. It works at this stage only if you are a user of the mobile application "TraceMob" and that you have configured the connector in your Cozy.

manifest.short_description: Keep track of your trips and analyze their impact on the environment.
manifest.long_description:
CoachCO2 is a self data application developed within the framework of the **territory of La Rochelle** and the [Agremob](https://agremob.com/) program.

 

Its ambition is to **help you** :
- to **become aware of the issues** related to mobility,
- to **question your travel habits**,
- and **find more sustainable alternatives** (yes it is possible!).

All this in complete confidentiality, as always in your Cozy: **only you have the right to access your data**, and you have the control to share it with whomever you want, whenever and if YOU want.

Its objective is also to **enable the emergence of new ecomobility projects or offers** thanks to the expertise of the program's partner structures.

 

Today this application forms a duo with **the mobile application TraceMob** whose connector, also present in the store of your Personal Cloud, collects and saves your mobility tracks at home.

Tomorrow **other sensors will complete your data**. The application, itself under development, is today focused on mobility, tomorrow other sources of CO2 may extend its scope.

 

[Agremob](https://agremob.com/) makes this application **a common good** that can be used beyond the borders of the La Rochelle agglomeration. If your Cozy's host does not offer it in its own store, contact them!

apps.description: Required by the cozy-bar to display the icons of the apps

settings.description: Required by the cozy-bar to display Claudy and know which applications are coming soon

files.description: Required to access the files for saved your export of trips

coachco2.settings.description: Used to manage your Coach CO2 settings

settings.anonymous_participation: Participate anonymously in the calculation of average CO2 emissions

tripsCard.label: Compare your emissions to the average of other users of the application?

compareDialog.title: Compare anonymously
compareDialog.primaryText: In order to average the emissions of users, and because your Cozy has made a promise to you to never disclose your data without your explicit request, it will ask you for the right to send this data.
compareDialog.secondaryText: This data will be aggregated and anonymous and will not contain any identifiers or locations.

permissionsDialog.title: Request for permissions
permissionsDialog.primaryText: The CO2 Coach application requires the following permissions from your Cozy:
permissionsDialog.secondaryText: Once authorized, the permissions can be modified in the settings
permissionsDialog.why_asking: Why ask me for these permissions?

reasonsDialog.title: Reasons for permissions
reasonsDialog.content: Because your Cozy has made a promise to you to never disclose your private data, it will always ask you for the right to let an application send it out.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content:
In order to encourage the use of alternative and sustainable modes of transportation, the implementation of the sustainable mobility package came into effect on May 10, 2020.

Thus, employees who choose an alternative and sustainable mode of transportation for their home-work commute will be able to benefit from a lump sum of %{bountyAmount}‚Ç¨ per year.

Your CO2 Coach will help you keep track of your home-work commute by bicycle and will allow you to generate the certificate of success to be transmitted to your employer!

how_trips_detected.title: How are my trips detected?
how_trips_detected.content:
Your home-work bike trips will be automatically detected based on your schedule and speed.

If a trip is not automatically detected as "Going to or from work", open the trip details and change the trip reason to "Going to or from work".

If a trip is not automatically detected as "bike", open the trip detail and change the mode of transportation to "bike".

once_goal_reach.title: What to do once the goal is reached
once_goal_reach.content: Once the goal is reached, you will be able to generate a certificate of achievement to send to your employer to benefit from your %{bountyAmount}‚Ç¨ package üéâ

deactivate.title: Do you really want to stop participating in the goal?
deactivate.content: You can always choose to participate again from the application settings.

success.text: Congratulations, you have achieved the ‚ÄúBike to Work‚Äù goal üéâ

alert.title: Ride your bike to work and receive %{bountyAmount}‚Ç¨!
alert.text: As part of the Sustainable Mobility Package (SMP) set up by the French government, go to work by bike %{daysToReach} days a year and receive %{bountyAmount}‚Ç¨!

naming.title: Lastname and firstname
naming.nameLegend: The first and last names entered will be used to generate the certificate of achievement once the objective has been reached. Please fill in the following information:

timing.timeLegend: You currently have a employment contract:
timing.percentageLegend:
The amount of the bonus depends on the number of hours worked. For part-time employees working 50% or more, the amount of the bonus will be the same as for a full-time employee. For employees working less than 50%, the amount of the bonus will be calculated pro rata to the time worked.

Fill in the percentage of your working time:

comparison.comparisonLegend: It is possible to display the average progression of the members %{source} who participate in the goal. To do so, you will be asked to also participate in the establishment of this average. Your progression data will be aggregated and sent anonymously, and will not contain any identifiers or locations.

certificateGeneration.title: Congratulations, you have achieved the ‚ÄúBike¬†to¬†Work‚Äú¬†goal
certificateGeneration.content: A certificate has been generated as proof of your success for the year %{year}. Forward it now by email to your employer to receive %{bountyAmount}‚Ç¨ !

DialogDefaultMode.primary: Set as default transport for this category?
DialogDefaultMode.secondary: The transport mode will automatically be selected as default for all future trips detected for this transport type.
